French Railway Signalling JOSM Presets

This page hosts the French Railway Signalling presets archive for the JOSM editor. These presets help map the railway signalling and infrastructure specific to France in OpenStreetMap / OpenRailwayMap.

Installation

  1. Open JOSM
  2. Go to Presets â†’ Preset preferences
  3. Search for French Railway Signalling from Available presets
  4. Select the match from the drop-down list
  5. Click the Arrow button to add it to the Active presets list
  6. Click OK to confirm and close the properties
